dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT j.attribute_date1, j.attribute4 loc_code, loc.location_xid cust_id, loc.location_name cust_name, loc.country_code3_gid cust_country, j.job_xid job_id, sref.shipment_refnum_value export_import, srn.shipment_refnum_value booking_no, s2.shipment_xid sell_ship_id, TO_CHAR(j.attribute_date1,'MM/DD/YYYY') bl_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(s1.total_ship_unit_count,'999,999,990')) containers, TO_CHAR((SELECT MAX(xapr.payment_date) FROM xxscou_as400_payment_receipts xapr WHERE xapr.shipment_id = LTRIM(SUBSTR(s2.shipment_xid, LENGTH(s2.shipment_xid) - 5,6),0)),'MM/DD/YYYY') payment_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(s2.total_actual_cost_base,'999,999,990.00')) total_cost FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj1 ON j.job_gid = jorj1.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul1 ON jorj1.order_release_gid = ssul1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj1 ON ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj1.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej1 ON sessuj1.s_equipment_gid = ssej1.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s1 ON ssej1.shipment_gid = s1.shipment_gid AND s1.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s1.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s1.is_primary = 'Y' AND s1.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj2 ON j.job_gid = jorj2.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul2 ON jorj2.order_release_gid = ssul2.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj2 ON ssul2.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj2.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej2 ON sessuj2.s_equipment_gid = ssej2.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s2 ON ssej2.shipment_gid = s2.shipment_gid AND s2.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s2.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s2.is_primary = 'Y' AND s2.perspective = 'S' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s2.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s1.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s1.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.SHIPTYPE' WHERE j.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND (TO_DATE(j.attribute_date1,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(j.attribute_date1,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:CUSTOMER_ID IS NULL OR (NOT :CUSTOMER_ID IS NULL AND sip.involved_party_contact_gid IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:CUSTOMER_ID,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) items FROM DUAL CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(:CUSTOMER_ID, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL))) AND (:CUSTOMER_COUNTRY IS NULL OR (NOT :CUSTOMER_COUNTRY IS NULL AND loc.country_code3_gid IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:CUSTOMER_COUNTRY,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) items FROM DUAL CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(:CUSTOMER_COUNTRY, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL))) ORDER BY loc.location_xid, j.attribute_date1
